name: FarmCry: Animal Tactics
description:
Skirmish wargame featuring two bands of farm animals crying one another to inflict stress and panic over the yard. Inspired by real-life wargames with miniatures, and made for game jam during november 2022.

Features completed:

  • Single-player mode with mediocre AI (Story mode)
  • Quick-play (enemy elimination) with 12 different starting positions for both bands.
  • Combat and movement system, allowing some decent tactical decisions to be made
  • Stress mechanic, leading to Panic mode impairing actions of your animals
  • Noise mechanic, waking up shepherd dog, who punishes most noisy animal (by her opinion)

To be done in 2023:

  • Animal abilities for player and AI (asymmetrical)
  • Simplified tutorial for those in need
  • Campaign mode with band composition and progression
  • Advanced terrain features and flying animals (chickens cant fly you know)

Next update will be after game hits 20 downloads (abilities)
